vote.title: To Celebrate the 51st Biennial of The National League of American Pen Women (NLAPW) and Welcome the Members to Columbus, Ohio
vote.description:
Title
 
To Celebrate the 51st Biennial of The National League of American Pen Women (NLAPW) and Welcome the Members to Columbus, Ohio
 
Body
WHEREAS, the national 51st Biennial of the The National League of American Pen Women (NLAPW) will be hosted in Columbus between April 26th-28th, 2024; and,
 
WHEREAS, the National League of American Pen Women seeks to engage professional women in all aspects of the arts, providing a forum for members to network and expand their horizons through friendships and encouragement ; and, 
 
WHEREAS, the Biennial’s theme is “To Create Takes Courage,” and features well-known speakers including the CEO of Creative Advisors, Angela Meleca, former excutive director and CEO of the Columbus Museum of Art, Nannette Maciejunes, and Linda Kass, an award-winning author; and,
 
WHEREAS, this event highlights the importance of art within society, including civic engagement; and, 
 
WHEREAS, the City of Columbus is grateful for the work of the National League of American Pen Women (NLAPW) and is excited to host the national 51st Biennial; now, therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council hereby celebrates the the 51st Biennial of The National League of American Pen Women (NLAPW) and offers a warm welcome all those attending the event to the City.
